items.title: Fix js unit tests code, add status badge and airbrake code
items.body:
## Checklist
- [x] Open a pull request
- [x] Give the pull request a suitable title, description and other details mentioned below
- [x] Push all my commits to GitHub
- [x] Update the [version number](https://github.com/ClydeDz/cicd-docs/blob/fb939ffdb6fb1601ce8de79f96ef44628a4a1348/js/modules/globalSettings.js#L72)
- [x] All JavaScript unit tests pass
- [x] Images have a prefix of `https://clydedz.github.io/cicd-docs` like [this image here](https://github.com/ClydeDz/cicd-docs/blob/fb939ffdb6fb1601ce8de79f96ef44628a4a1348/index.html#L69) *(if any)*

## What does this PR aim at fixing?
*Please be as narrative as you like. Or if you prefer bullet points, that's fine too. Use of [emoji's](https://www.webpagefx.com/tools/emoji-cheat-sheet/) most welcome!*  
- Fixes JavaScript unit test issue not being detected by Visual Studio and Azure DevOps build    
- Add status badge showing operational status from Hund
- Add airbrake code to the application
    
## Related issues 
*Please reference any issue numbers here if this PR relates to any.*
Closes #6 and closes #2
